name: Cerulean Ascension
description:
The Mirian Alliance is under attack! The nation's automated defense systems have been subverted by Zebryx counter-operatives. It's up to you to pilot an experimental airship, code named CERULEAN, and mount the final defense. Defeat the automated systems and take on the Zebryx forces! Can you save the lives of the innocent people under siege? Can you end the threat of the Zebryx once and for all and bring peace to the skies?

Play this all new, action-packed, original game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. A classic genre, reimagined for a modern audience, this game has been developed from scratch to run on the original NES, and when you buy the game you'll receive a ROM file upon completion.  The ROM will be playable on standard NES emulators as well as on actual NES hardware using a flash cartridge such as an Everdrive. This may or may not work on clone systems like a Retron, so be warned that your mileage may vary.  It will work on the Analogue NT Mini and the RetroUSB AVS, in addition to an original NES.

Players who pre-order the game before final release get limited access to the 6502 assembly language source code for educational purposes. The game is currently in development. While important updates will be posted here in the devlog, this game is also being developed publicly both live on Twitch and also with devlogs posted on YouTube.
